text: The men's 50 metres hurdles event at the 1967 European Indoor Games was held on 11 and 12 March in Prague. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Karin Balzer '''' |Vlasta Seifertová '''' |Inge Schell '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 from each heat (Q) qualified directly for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
